prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Promptbook is suitable for complex LLM-based applications, separating code from prompts, and orchestrating multiple prompts, but may not be ideal for simple single-prompt implementations or non-JavaScript/TypeScript environments.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Promptbook, complex LLM-based applications, separating code, prompts, orchestrating, multiple prompts, JavaScript, TypeScript
